author: Reuters Editorial
title: Guangdong VTR Bio-Tech to pay cash dividend of 0.4 yuan per 10 shares on May 11
text:
May 7 (Reuters) - Guangdong VTR Bio-Tech Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.4 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on May 10
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 11 and the dividend will be paid on May 11
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/FLE8fM
 (Beijing Headline News)
